definition.name: GitHub - Activity - Readme
definition.description: Updates README with the recent GitHub activity of a user
definition.author: jamesgeorge007

inputs.name: COMMIT_MSG
inputs.description: Commit message used while committing to the repo
inputs.default: :zap: Update README with the recent activity

inputs.name: MAX_LINES
inputs.description: The maximum number of lines populated in your readme file

inputs.name: TARGET_FILE
inputs.description: The file location to write changes to

inputs.name: EMPTY_COMMIT_MSG
inputs.description: Commit message used when there are no updates
inputs.default: :memo: empty commit to keep workflow active after 60 days of no activity
